      private void deserializeCell​(java.lang.Object cell, java.lang.String[][] workersBoard, int row, int col)
      Brief Analyzes the content of a board's cell, updating two other boards: one containing all the buildings' levels and the other one ready to be printed
      Parameters:
      cell - is the cell that has to be analyzed
      workersBoard - is a board containing the workers' genders correctly formatted with their respective color
      row - is the cell's row
      col - is the cell's column
